availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver C. Curry (Kentucky and Indiana merchant, justice of the peace, and attorney)

body.p: Kentucky and Indiana merchant, justice of the peace, and attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth "Eliza" Brooks Miller Curry. Father of Clarence C. Curry and Fry L. Curry. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Jefferson County in 1865. Relocated to Indiana in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 82; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, Ward 1, p. 9; Find A Grave, "Oliver C Curry (1834-1875)," Memorial #120516909, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=120516909&ref=acom (accessed May 2, 2017).
